mapper.select:
SELECT BOOK_THUMBNAIL, BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_AUTHOR, BOOK_NO, BOOK_STATE, BOOK_ISBN, BOOK_SUPPLE, BOOK_PUB, BOOK_PUB_DT, (SELECT TO_CHAR(RETURN_DUE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM BORROW BOR WHERE B.BOOK_NO = BOR.BOOK_NO AND RETURN_DT IS NULL) RETURN_DUE_DT, (SELECT COUNT(*)FROM B_RESERVATION BR WHERE B.BOOK_NO = BR.BOOK_NO) RESV_COUNT FROM BOOK B WHERE
BOOK_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%'
BOOK_AUTHOR LIKE '%${query}%'
(BOOK_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%' OR BOOK_AUTHOR LIKE '%${query}%')
1=1
AND BOOK_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%'
AND BOOK_AUTHOR LIKE '%${author}%'
AND BOOK_PUB LIKE '%${pub}%'
AND TO_NUMBER(BOOK_PUB_DT) >= #{startYear}
AND TO_NUMBER(BOOK_PUB_DT) <= #{endYear}
ORDER BY BOOK_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_REQUEST VALUES (SEQ_RBOOK_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{bookAuthor}, #{bookTitle}, #{bookPub}, #{reqTitle}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, TO_DATE(#{bookPubDate}, 'YYYY-DD-MM'), #{reqOpinion})
mapper.select: SELECT REQ_BOOK_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, REQ_TITLE, REQ_APPROVE, REQ_OPINION, TO_CHAR(REQ_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQ_DT FROM BOOK_REQUEST JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY REQ_BOOK_NO
